title: Sentinel
content:
Sentinel When an enemy within melee range attacks an ally, you can use a reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel Feat. You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks, and when you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, it can no longer move for the rest of its tum.

BG3 Sentinel Tips & Notes

Notes & Tips go here This can act as a soft taunt on enemy targets you are melee with. Any melee target will not be able to move out of range or attack an ally. If they do, they get an advantaged opportunity struck and they are not able to move. This feat works with sneak attack on Rogues. Sneak Attacks can only be used once per turn, so if you took an SA reaction between your turn, you can't use it in the turn after. Does not work with any forms of Wild Shape.
